title: The Exorcist: Believer
description: When two girls disappear into the woods and return possessed, their families confront pure evil.

title: Talk to Me
description: A group of friends discover how to conjure spirits using an embalmed hand - with terrifying consequences.

title: Evil Dead Rise
description: A twisted tale of two estranged sisters whose reunion is cut short by demonic forces.

title: Smile
description: After witnessing a bizarre traumatic incident, a doctor becomes convinced something supernatural is haunting her.

title: The Nun II
description: 1956 France - a priest is murdered and evil is spreading. Sister Irene faces Valak again.

title: M3GAN
description: A robotics engineer creates an AI doll that becomes violently protective of her orphaned niece.

title: Barbarian
description: A woman discovers the rental home she booked is already occupied by a stranger with a terrifying secret.

title: X
description: In 1979, a group of young filmmakers set out to make an adult film on a rural Texas farm.

title: Pearl
description: Trapped on her family's isolated farm, Pearl must tend to her ailing father under her mother's watch.

title: The Black Phone
description: A kidnapped boy receives calls on a disconnected phone from the killer's previous victims.

title: Hereditary
description: After the death of her secretive grandmother, a woman's family begins unraveling terrifying secrets.

title: The Conjuring
description: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence.
